brainly_data.question:
In which sentence does the verb agree with the subject? 
a. My parents and my brother is in the car.
b. Robotics and animation interests me more than 8.
c. Cheers and applause follow all the band’s performances.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
In which sentence does the verb agree with the subject? 
a. My parents and my brother is in the car.
b. Robotics and animation interests me more than 8.
c. Cheers and applause follow all the band’s performances.
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text:
The correct answer is C. Cheers and applause follow all the band’s performances.

This is because "cheers and applause" can is treated in the same manner as the pronoun "they" and an agreement for they would be "follow". Other sentences are incorrect.
